attributes.action: Require Parliament's consent to Invoke EU Treaty Art. 50 based on detailed terms
attributes.background: The EU Referendum is not binding and Parliament is sovereign.  Leaving the EU requires the UK to invoke Article 50 of the EU Treaty.  It should only invoke Article 50 based on indicative terms to be proposed to the EUapproved by Parliament

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
